page.title: 20CONCLUSION
page.content:
This survey was taken in the form of two visits to{BROOK,}by minibus.Seven girls collected the information in two separate groups. One group walked along the ridge of {COMPTON DOWNS,}while the other explored the area around{DUNSBURY {FARM.}Later people were questioned on their views and feelings of living in the area. After the information was collected the groups compared them and began to write about the area. We found Brook to be a typical rural district, which we enjoyed investigating.
{ LISA DONNELLAN, SARAH GODDEN, JACKIE {HALL-WILSON, JANE MORGAN, DEBRA {ORCHARD, HAZEL PARKER, JENNIFER RASEY.
